effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 623,598 damage to your primary target and 134,220 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 947,767 Fire damage split between nearby enemies.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
